entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Webequie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
